title: Jeffrey Toobin on Writing About Trump
description: Toobin talks about “True Crimes and Misdemeanors,” and Dayna Tortorici discusses Elena Ferrante’s “The Lying Life of Adults.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
